metadata.title: CVE-2021-45343 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: In LibreCAD 2.2.0, a NULL pointer dereference in the HATCH handling of libdxfrw allows an attacker to crash the application using a crafted DXF document.

notes.note: eslerm> provided PoC still crashes program after applying patch

criterions.comment: librecad package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
